text: Iʙrohim va Ja'quʙ ʙa farzandoni xud ʙa in kalima vasijat kardand, «Ej farzandoni man, Alloh ʙaroi sumo in dinro ixtijor kardaast, va in dini islom ast, ki Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ʙa in din omad va dar ajjomi zindagiaton az on cudo masaved, pas az in cahon namired, magar in ki sumo farmonʙardor ʙosed». (Ja'ne, dar dini islom ʙosed)
